name: simplex-chat
description: SimpleX Chat is a privacy-focused messaging platform with E2E encryption and no identifiers. It provides mobile and desktop clients, and can use self-hosted servers as transport nodes.
features: No identifiers: Operates without phone numbers, emails, or usernames for maximum privacy.
End-to-end encryption: Encrypts all messages, calls, and files with double-ratchet protocol.
Self-hosted servers: Run your own relay servers for complete control over message routing.
Disappearing messages: Sets automatic message deletion after specified time periods.
Group chats: Creates encrypted group conversations with admin controls.
Voice and video calls: Supports encrypted audio and video calls between users.
File sharing: Sends encrypted files and media through the chat interface.
Desktop and mobile: Available on Linux, Windows, macOS, iOS, and Android.
Incognito profiles: Creates temporary identities for specific conversations.
Database encryption: Protects local message history with password encryption.
No metadata leakage: Designed to minimize metadata collection and correlation.
Open protocol: Uses open-source protocol allowing third-party client development.
